Text.Page:
The wretched ice giants won't let us recover the bodies of our honored dead.

We've got a duty to our comrades to do what we can for themâ€”even in death.

Head to Raseri Festning and recover whatever you can from our fallen soldiers.
I appreciate this, <PCNAME>. We all die alone, but that doesn't mean we should be forgotten. The families of our friends will grieve easier thanks to you.
Bring back any tokens or amulets you find. I'll send them along with the letters of condolence.
